data.title: From 'Love Next Door' to 'The Tyrant': 14 K-Drama OTT releases to watch out for this month
data.meta_description: This August featured a rich selection of new K-dramas, ranging from romantic tales like 'Bad Memory Eraser' and 'Romance in the House' to the thriller 'Your Honour' and the awaited season two of 'Pachinko'. The assortment provided audiences with various genres to suit their preferences for indoor entertainment.
data.text:
Synopsis

This August featured a rich selection of new K-dramas, ranging from romantic tales like 'Bad Memory Eraser' and 'Romance in the House' to the thriller 'Your Honour' and the awaited season two of 'Pachinko'. The assortment provided audiences with various genres to suit their preferences for indoor entertainment.

As August heats up, so does the lineup of K-drama releases. With a variety of genres and star-studded casts, there's plenty to keep you entertained indoors this month. Here’s a sneak peek at 14 of the best new Korean dramas premiering in August.

1. Bad Memory Eraser

In this romantic drama, tennis hopeful Lee Goon (Kim Jae-joong) uses a "memory eraser" to regain his confidence after an injury. His first love, psychiatrist Kyeong Joo-yeon (Jin Se-yeon), works at the brain research center that developed the device. (MBN, August 2).

Read More: Bigg Boss OTT 3 Finale Live Updates

2. Romance in the House

After going bankrupt and divorcing, Byron Mu-jin (Ji Jin-hee) returns as a billionaire, surprising his ex-wife Geum Ye-yeon (Kim Ji-soo) and daughter Byeon Mi-rae (Son Na-eun). (JTBC, August 10)

3. The Tyrant

Former agent Im Sang (Cha Seung-won), government bureau director Choi (Kim Seon-ho), and foreign operative Paul (Kim Kang-woo) race to locate a missing bioweapon in this thriller directed by Park Hoon-jung. (Disney+, August 14)

4. Black Out

Ko Jung-woo (Byun Yo-han) teams up with a detective to uncover the truth about a murder he doesn’t remember committing after serving ten years in jail. (MBC, August 16)

Read More: Bigg Boss OTT Winner Prediction

5. Your Honour

In this legal thriller, judge Song Pan-ho (Son Hyun-joo) and crime boss Kim Gang-heon (Kim Myung-min) clash after their children are involved in a car accident. (ENA, August 12)

6. Love Andante

Set in a "peace village" between North and South Korea, South Korean pianist Im Joo-hyung (Kwon Hyun-bin) and North Korean military officer’s daughter Ha Na-kyung (Song Ji-woo) navigate a cross-cultural romance. (Lifetime, August 7)

7. Perfect Family

The seemingly perfect Choi family unravels after the murder of daughter Seon-hee’s friend, Park Kyung-ho. (KBS2, August 14)

8. DNA Lover

Doctor Shim Yeon-woo (Choi Siwon) and DNA researcher Han So-jin (Jung In-sun) navigate a quirky romance as she searches for her perfect genetic match. (TV Chosun, August 17)

9. Pachinko Season Two

The acclaimed adaptation of Min Jin Lee’s novel continues, chronicling the lives of a Korean family in Japan. (Apple TV+, August 23)

10. The Frog

Holiday rental owner Jeon Young-ha (Kim Yun-seok) welcomes Yoo Sung-a (Go Min-si) to his cottage, connecting it to a dark past involving Koo Sang-joon (Yoon Kye-sang). (Netflix, August 23)

11. Cinderella at 2 AM

Office worker Ha Yoon-seo (Shin Hyun-bin) discovers her boyfriend Seo Joo-won (Moon Sang-min) is the heir to their company, challenging her disbelief in fairy tales. (Channel A/Coupang Play, August 24)

12. No Gain, No Love

Penny-pinching Son Hae-young (Shin Min-a) fakes a marriage with part-time cashier Kim Ji-wook (Kim Young-dae) to get a promotion at work. (tvN, August 26)

13. Queen Woo

In this historical drama, Empress Woo Hee (Jeon Jong-seo) becomes a target for power-hungry tribes and princes after her husband’s death. (TVing, August)

14. Love Next Door

Architect Choi Seung-hyo (Jung Hae-in) reconnects with Bae Seok-kyu (Jung So-min), the daughter of his mom’s friend, who has hit a rough patch. (tvN, August 17)

This August, make sure to grab your favorite snacks and settle in for a month full of captivating K-dramas that promise to deliver everything from heartwarming romances to thrilling mysteries!
